products.name: Washington Suite Sofa
products.description: A luxurious, comfortable sofa with high-density foam cushions, perfect for any modern living space. Available in multiple colors.

products.name: Dario round table
products.description: A sleek, minimalist white round dining table with a sturdy base, ideal for contemporary spaces. Seats up to 4 people.

products.name: Humphrey 5 Piece Corner Suite
products.description: A stylish 5-piece corner suite with plush cushioning and a durable frame. Perfect for large living areas, offering comfort and elegance.

products.name: Gemona Suite
products.description: The Gemona Suite offers a chic and modern design with soft, durable fabric and deep cushions for ultimate comfort. Ideal for family living spaces.

products.name: Kingsley Suite
products.description: A premium Kingsley Suite designed for luxury and style. Features high-quality upholstery, ergonomic design, and ample seating for a sophisticated look.

products.name: Reilly Suite
products.description: The Reilly Suite combines timeless elegance with practical comfort. Upholstered in a soft fabric, it fits beautifully in any classic or contemporary home.

products.name: Ambassador Bed Frame
products.description: A sleek and elegant bed frame with a sturdy build, designed to provide maximum comfort and style for your bedroom.

products.name: Aurora Lift-Up Bed Frame
products.description: The Aurora Lift-Up Bed Frame features a practical lift-up storage solution, combining convenience with luxury, perfect for maximizing space.

products.name: Isabel Lift-Up Bed
products.description: A modern, space-saving bed with a stylish lift-up mechanism, ideal for those looking to optimize their bedroom storage.

products.name: Oslo Lift-Up Bed Frame
products.description: The Oslo Lift-Up Bed Frame combines Scandinavian design with practical storage, offering a sleek and functional solution for modern bedrooms.

products.name: Pembrooke Table and Bench
products.description: A stylish table and bench set made from premium wood, offering a timeless design that fits perfectly in both traditional and modern dining spaces.

products.name: Salcombe Large Extending Table
products.description: The Salcombe Large Extending Table offers ample space for gatherings, with an elegant extension mechanism that allows for easy size adjustments.

products.name: X Table
products.description: A minimalist X-shaped table designed with a modern touch, perfect for smaller dining areas or as a statement piece in contemporary spaces.
